      • getParentGraph

        @Nullable
public ISolverFactorGraph getParentGraph()
        Returns the solver factor graph to which this node belongs.

        The implementation provided by this class simply returns the solver object associated with the model variable's FactorGraph.

        This means that if the solver is changed on the model, this will return the new solver graph object, which may not be applicable to this instance.

        Specified by:
        getParentGraph in interface ISolverNode

public ISolverFactorGraph getRootGraph()
        Description copied from interface: ISolverNode

      • getGuess

        public java.lang.Object getGuess()
        Description copied from interface: ISolverVariable
        Current value of guess for this variable.

        Returns value previously assigned by ISolverVariable.setGuess(Object) or else returns result of ISolverVariable.getValue().

        Specified by:
        getGuess in interface ISolverVariable

      • createMessageEvent

        @Nullable
protected SolverEvent createMessageEvent(int edge,
                                      @Nullable
                                      IParameterizedMessage oldMessage,
                                      IParameterizedMessage newMessage)
        Creates a IMessageUpdateEvent event.

        Default implementation returns null. When this method returns null, then SNode.supportsMessageEvents() should also return false.

        The SVariableBase implementation returns a VariableToFactorMessageEvent.

        Overrides:
        createMessageEvent in class SNode
        Parameters:
        edge - is the outgoing edge for the messages.
        oldMessage - is the previous value of the message, which may be null.
        newMessage - is the new message value, which must not be null.

      • messageEventType

        protected java.lang.Class<? extends SolverEvent> messageEventType()
        Description copied from class: SNode
        If SNode.supportsMessageEvents(), this returns the base type for all message events that can be created by this object. Default implementation returns null.
        Overrides:
        messageEventType in class SNode
